content.text:
# 2024 Empire Slovak Open – Singles

Moyuka Uchijima
| runner   =  Mona Barthel
| score    = 7–6(7–3), 6–3
| type = singles doubles
}}
Yanina Wickmayer was the defending champion but chose not to participate.
Moyuka Uchijima won the title, defeating Mona Barthel in the final, 7–6(7–3), 6–3.
Seeds
Mai Hontama (second round)
#  Moyuka Uchijima (champion)
#  Tamara Zidanšek (quarterfinals)
#  Viktória Hrunčáková (withdrew)
#  Zeynep Sönmez (first round)
#  Martina Capurro Taborda (first round)
#  Irina Bara (first round)
#  Veronika Erjavec (semifinals)
}}
